item.title: CVE-2024-37221|2024-07-22T20:25:05.091Z -- michael%20bester -- kimili%20flash%20embed
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Michael Bester Kimili Flash Embed allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Kimili Flash Embed: from n/a through 2.5.3.
